name: "South Park" Season 2 - Part 2 Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: In "Chickenpox", who is the last kid to get chickenpox?
questions.explanation:
Kyle.

	During the episode, the kids' parents try to give the boys chickenpox, so the boys try and get their revenge.  In the end, all of the kids end up in the hospital, and Kenny dies of his chickenpox.

questions.text: In "Roger Ebert Should Lay Off the Fatty Foods", what place are the kids being subliminally attracted to?
questions.explanation:
The planetarium.

	The owner of the planetarium uses the laser light show to hypnotize the kids into drumming up business for the planetarium.  Also, Cartman gets an acting job singing the "Cheesy Poofs" song for a commercial.

questions.text: In "Clubhouses", the boys build clubhouses to play what game?
questions.explanation:
Truth or Dare.

	Bebe ends up kissing Kyle, but Stan doesn't kiss Wendy.  Cartman also makes his own clubhouse, but many older kids go to it instead, and they even hold big parties in it.  Stan's parents split up and then get back together in this episode.

questions.text: In "Cow Days", Cartman believes that he is a Vietnamese prostitute named Ming Li.
questions.explanation:
True.

	In "Cow Days", the boys force Cartman to go into a bull rodeo to earn them money.  The money would be used to help the kids win cheap, yet fake Terrence and Philip dolls.

questions.text: Who originally wrote the song, "Stinky Britches"?
questions.explanation:
Chef.

	Chef tries to get his name in the credits of the song when Alanis Morissette produces it, but the record company sues him.  In this episode, "Chef Aid", Mr. Hat returns and South Park has a concert for Chef.

questions.text: In "Spookyfish", which celebrity's head is on every corner of the screen through the entire episode?
questions.explanation:
Barbara Streisand.

	The episode "Spookyfish" is filmed in "Spooky Vision", so Barbara's head is on every corner to make the show scarier.  In the episode, Stan's new fish begins to kill people around town, and the boys realize that there's a dimensional rift in the local pet shop.

questions.text: In "Merry Christmas, Charlie Manson", where does Cartman's grandma live?
questions.explanation:
Nebraska.

	In this episode, Cartman takes the boys to his family's home in Nebraska for a few days.  Soon, Cartman's uncle breaks out of the penitentiary and brings Charlie Manson along.

questions.text: What kind of shop does Tweek's family own?
questions.explanation:
Coffee shop.

	In the episode "Gnomes", Tweek's dad struggles to keep his coffee shop in business when a big coffee chain moves in next door.  Also, the boys have to do a project with Tweek so that Mr. Garrison doesn't get fired, and Tweek's father ends up trying to save his business by writing their report about small town businesses.

questions.text: What is the prehistoric ice man's real name in "Prehistoric Ice Man"?
questions.explanation:
Larry.

	Kyle and Stan fight over the ice man and they decide not to be best friends anymore.  Larry was only frozen for thirty-two months yet everyone still thinks he's some sort of animal after they thaw him.  When the ice man leaves, the boys become best friends again.

Ozzy Osbourne.

	Ozzy Osbourne bit Kenny's head off on the Chef Aid stage in this episode.  Other celebrities in this episode include Meat Loaf, Elton John, and Rick James.
